description: Number of days for which to retrieve historical data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Usage Statistics

We are using Google Analytics for aggregated statistics about our website
visitors.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We added a "anonymize-IP" function to the tracking code to make sure
no personal data is collected in this process.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Data collection on our website

**Who is responsible for the data collection on this website?

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**

The data collected on this website are processed by the website operator.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: **How do we collect your data?

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**

Some data are collected when you provide it to us.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This could, for example, be
data you enter on a contact form.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Other data are collected automatically by our IT systems when you visit the
website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
These data are primarily technical data such as the browser and
operating system you are using or when you accessed the page.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
These data are
collected automatically as soon as you enter our website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**

Part of the data is collected to ensure the proper functioning of the website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**

You always have the right to request information about your stored data, its
origin, its recipients, and the purpose of its collection at no charge.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Analytics and third-party tools

When visiting our website, statistical analyses may be made of your surfing
behavior.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Server log files

The website provider automatically collects and stores information that your
browser automatically transmits to us in "server log files".

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
These are:

  * Browser type and browser version
  * Operating system used
  * Referrer URL
  * Host name of the accessing computer
  * Time of the server request
  * IP address

These data will not be combined with data from other sources.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The mandatory
information requested during registration must be provided in full.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: This link gives us access to your data stored on Facebook.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Including
especially your:

  * Facebook name
  * Facebook profile picture
  * Facebook cover picture
  * Email address provided to Facebook
  * Facebook ID
  * Facebook friends
  * Facebook Likes
  * Birthday
  * Gender
  * Country
  * Language

This data will be used to set up, provide, and personalize your account.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Leaving comments on this website

If you use the comment function on this site, the time at which you created
the comment and your email address will be stored along with your comment, as
well as your username, unless you are posting anonymously.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Storage of the IP address**

Our comment function stores the IP addresses of those users who post comments.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**How long comments are stored**

The comments and the associated data (e.g.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Analytics and advertising

### Google Analytics

This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
**Objecting to the collection of data**

You can prevent the collection of your data by Google Analytics by clicking on
the following link.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
An opt-out cookie will be set to prevent your data from
being collected on future visits to this site: [Disable Google
Analytics](javascript:gaOptout\(\);).

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Google AdSense uses so-called "cookies", which are text files stored in your
computer that enable an analysis of the way you use the website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Through these
web beacons, information such as the visitor traffic on these pages can be
evaluated.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The information generated by cookies and web beacons relating to your use of
this website (including your IP address), and delivery of advertising formats,
is transmitted to a Google server in the US and stored there.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By using this website, you agree
to the processing of data relating to you and collected by Google as described
and for the purposes set out above.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If you visit one of our pages featuring a YouTube plugin, a connection to the
YouTube servers is established.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If you're logged in to your YouTube account, YouTube allows you to associate
your browsing behavior directly with your personal profile.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: To use Google Maps, it is necessary to save your IP address.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Amazon uses cookies to trace the origin of the
orders.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
As a result, Amazon can detect that you clicked the affiliate link on
our website.
